mapper.insert: insert into UO_OP_ACTIVITY_TEMPLATE(TMP_CODE, TMP_CONTENT, TMP_CONTENT_NORMAL) values (#{code}, #{content}, #{contentNormal})
mapper.select: select TMP_CODE, TMP_CONTENT, REMARK, INSERT_DT, INSERT_BY, UPDATE_DT, UPDATE_BY, LABEL, TMP_CONTENT_NORMAL from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_TEMPLATE where TMP_CODE = #{code}
mapper.update: update UO_OP_ACTIVITY_TEMPLATE set TMP_CONTENT = #{content}, TMP_CONTENT_NORMAL = #{contentNormal} where TMP_CODE = #{code}
mapper.select: select count(1) from UO_OP_ACTIVITY_TEMPLATE where TMP_CODE = #{code}
